info.title: Java
info.text: Here you can find some Java projects I have made during my studies. My first touch to language was trough mobile solutions on first year of my engineering studies. Quickly it became my favourite language for programming, which lead me to deepen my skills during studies with projects and courses.

info.title: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP
info.text: Here you can find some web projects I made during years before and during my current studies. My first touch to web development was during Vocational College, where we had multiple courses of HTML, CSS, PHP, and a little bit of JavaScript. Back then I found my interest towards programming.

info.title: C#
info.text: Here you can find some game development projects I have carried out using C#. My first touch to language was on first year of my current engineering studies, at game development period. I have found game development and C# as interesting and fun thing to do, even on my spare time. Therefore, I am participating on bigger game project with multiple people and to smaller game project I am making with my friends.

info.title: C/C++
info.text: Here you can find some practises and projects made with C/C++. My first touch to C-languages were on my first year of current engineering studies. C-languages were taught trough basics and robotics. Later I have deepened my skills with extra courses that went trough the basics of both languages, object-oriented programming using pointers and much more.

java.title: Basic Rock-Paper-Scissors
java.text: Basic paper-rock-scissors game, to demonstrate how I structure programs in Java and overall basic skill usage.

java.title: Reservice
java.tech: Java, JavaFX, Maven, JUnit5, Jenkins, SQL, Hibernate, Nektion
java.text: A bigger project made in school. This project took two periods to make, and it was made in team of four. We wanted to create a program for smaller or medium sized companies to help manage meeting room reservations.

java.title: F1-remote controlled robot
java.text: Project of remote-controlled robot, done in first period of my major studies in engineering. Robot was built from Lego Mindstorms. Project was made in team of four, from two focused on building robot and I was on other two who focused on programming.

java.title: Mobile App - Antidarra
java.text: This project was first I have made in Java. The project was done in team of three, but still it was done mostly by me. Mobile app was made for students to keep count of drinks they have drank and to keep count how much water you should drink to compensate. And how long it will take before all the alcohol has been decreased from your body. The mobile app includes a quiz about your drinking habits.
